scene_description_enriched: A female saint, identified by a halo, stands holding a book in her left hand and a pair of pincers in her right. She wears a flowing robe and a cloak fastened at the neck. Behind her, to the right, a tower-like structure with a rounded top is visible, suggesting an urban or ecclesiastical setting. To the left, a vine with grapes is depicted, possibly symbolizing the Eucharist or the Passion of Christ. The scene is framed by an arched canopy above.
